Body:
Description: Hi Support,

Good Day!

We would like to ask how PingCastle detects obsolete version of Windows? Is there a database of all Windows version which the tool checks? Or do you have an official Microsoft article where you base the obsolete versions?

Thanks!
What We've Learned Updated: PingCastle uses the Microsoft docs that contains the EoS,and then include a check in the reports.
Next Steps Updated: Close the case as customer is ok with it.
